remarks: A Cauchy sequence predicate can be expressed in terms of the Cauchy filter predicate for a suitably chosen filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
caucfil.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
caucfil.2 $e |- L = ( ( X FilMap F ) ` ( ZZ>= " Z ) ) $.
caucfil $p |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ M e. ZZ /\ F : Z --> X ) -> ( F e. ( Cau ` D ) <-> L e. ( CauFil ` D ) ) ) $.
